textSection.mdTextInfoMain:
**Who We Are**

We are primarily based in the Pentagon - though we also have office space on both the east and west coast - and our range of [talent](https://dds.mil/talent) includes world-class [software developers, designers, product managers, digital experts, and bureaucracy hackers](https://dds.mil/team) from both the private sector and within government. DDS focuses on high-impact projects that advance the Department of Defense's most important initiatives that are critical to the well-being of service members, civilians, and core operations of the Department.

**How We Team**
In addition to bringing in private sector and government talent, DDS partners with military services by detailing service members to DDS teams to tackle some of the DoD's highest priority challenges.

[MEET OUR TEAM](https://dds.mil/team).
textSection.mdTextInfoCallout: **Our Mission:** To provide the best in modern technology to bolster national defense

iconSection.heading: Go where we're needed
iconSection.details: Going all-in regardless of location is important. We quickly mobilize our team to go wherever we're needed.

iconSection.heading: Do work that matters.
iconSection.details: We work on high-impacy technology projects that help the DoD meet the needs and improve the lives of service members and civilians.

iconSection.heading: Design side by side with users.
iconSection.details: Good design is more than just design thinking. It's designing directly with users to ensure the product and supporting processes meet needs the first time.

iconSection.heading: Tell the truth, and signal intent
iconSection.details: We're in the business of saving lives. We tell the truth, speak up, and signal intent within the department.

iconSection.heading: Hire the best to serve the best.
iconSection.details: Our people make us unique, and it's our people who are best positioned to serve the unique needs of DOD.
